com.pcr.android.widget
类 PullActivateLayout

java.lang.Object
  FrameLayout
      com.pcr.android.widget.PullActivateLayout

public class PullActivateLayout
extends FrameLayout

PullActiveLayout is designed to activate an action by pull. It base on FrameLayout. This class defined two special child: actionView & toolView The actionView can be use on pull action (Ex. pull to refresh). The toolView is a hidden view on first showing, it can be use as a hidden tool bar. The two special child will be identify by its id.

版本：
v0.1
作者：
PCR(pcrxjxj@gmail.com) on May 2nd, 2012

public boolean isPullOut()
Indicates whether all children view has been pull down under the top of layout.

返回：

smoothScrollBy

public final void smoothScrollBy(int dy)
Like View#scrollBy, but scroll smoothly instead of immediately.

参数：
dy - the number of pixels to scroll by on the Y axis

smoothScrollTo

public final void smoothScrollTo(int y)
Like scrollTo(int, int), but scroll smoothly instead of immediately.

参数：
y - the position where to scroll on the Y axis
